name: Create Smart Telegram Reminders with GPT-4 Mini and Airtable Cancel Codes
description:
How It Works

User sends a reminder request via Telegram (e.g., ‚ÄúRemind me to clean the garage tomorrow at 12 pm‚Äù).

The request is parsed by AI Agent and stored in Airtable with a unique reminder code.

The reminder workflow checks Airtable at scheduled intervals and sends a Telegram notification when the reminder is due.

Each reminder includes a unique cancel code (e.g., Reply 4936 to stop this reminder).

If the user replies with the code, the bot searches Airtable, deletes the reminder, and confirms the deletion in Telegram.

If the code doesn‚Äôt exist, the bot replies ‚ÄúCode not found.‚Äù

‚ö° Setup Steps

Create a Telegram Bot

Use BotFather
 on Telegram.

Run /newbot and copy your bot token.

Add the token in your Telegram Trigger and Telegram Send nodes in n8n.

Set Up Airtable

Create an Airtable base called REMINDER-TABLE.

Add a table with fields:

title (Text) ‚Äì reminder text

due_at (Date/Time) ‚Äì when the reminder is due

chat_id (Text) ‚Äì user‚Äôs Telegram chat ID

code (Number/Text) ‚Äì unique cancel code

Generate an API key / Personal Access Token and connect it in n8n.

Import This Workflow

In n8n, click Import Workflow.

Paste the JSON template.

Connect your Telegram and Airtable credentials.

Activate the Workflow

Start the workflow in n8n Cloud or Self-Hosted.

Send a test reminder in Telegram (e.g., ‚ÄúRemind me in 5 minutes to call mom‚Äù).

When notified, reply with the cancel code to test deletion.

Optional Customizations

Modify reminder frequency (Every 5 minutes node).

Change reminder message formatting in the Format Message node.

Add logging/analytics by connecting Google Sheets or another DB.

‚ö° Result: You now have a fully automated AI-powered Telegram Reminder Bot with Airtable storage, cancel codes, and real-time notifications!

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

parameters.content:
üîî ReminderBot with Telegram + Airtable

This workflow turns your Telegram into a personal reminder assistant powered by Airtable.
Users can set reminders, receive notification messages, and cancel reminders by replying with a unique code.

‚ú® Features

üì≤ Telegram Integration ‚Äì Set reminders and manage them directly from Telegram.

üóÑÔ∏è Airtable Storage ‚Äì All reminders are stored in Airtable with fields like title, due date, chat_id, and a unique code.

‚è∞ Scheduler ‚Äì Automatically checks every few minutes for reminders that are due.

üîë Unique Cancel Code ‚Äì Each reminder is given a code. Reply with that code to stop/delete the reminder.

‚úÖ Smart Responses:

If the reminder is found ‚Üí sends deleted confirmation.

If no reminder matches the code ‚Üí sends ‚ÄúCode not found.‚Äù

üõ†Ô∏è How It Works

Telegram Trigger ‚Äì Listens for messages.

If the message is natural language (‚ÄúRemind me tomorrow 10am to‚Ä¶‚Äù), it is parsed by the AI Agent.

If the message is a code (e.g., 1234), it is treated as a cancel request.

AI Agent (OpenAI) ‚Äì Interprets natural text into a structured reminder:

Title (task description)

Due date/time

Timezone

Generates a unique cancellation code.

Airtable ‚Äì Stores the reminder with fields: chat_id, title, due_at, code, etc.

Scheduler ‚Äì Every X minutes:

Fetches pending reminders due.

Sends them via Telegram (Reminder: do X. Reply 1234 to stop).

Cancel Flow ‚Äì

User sends back the code.

Airtable is searched by chat_id + code.

If found ‚Üí record is deleted + user notified.

If not found ‚Üí sends back ‚ÄúCode not found.‚Äù

Setup Instructions

Telegram Bot

Create a bot via @BotFather
.

Copy the API Token into your n8n Telegram Trigger + Send nodes.

Airtable

Create a base called REMINDER-TABLE.

Add a table with at least these fields:

chat_id (Text)

title (Text)

due_at (Date/Time)

code (Number or Text)

Add your Airtable Personal Access Token in n8n credentials.

OpenAI Agent (optional but recommended)

Add your OpenAI API key to parse natural text into structured reminders.

Scheduler Node

Set an interval (e.g., every 5 minutes) to check for pending reminders.

Run + Test

In Telegram, send:

Remind me at 6pm to call mom
